welcome.title: Hello Functionlander!
welcome.disclaimer: By using this product you agree to the terms and conditions at fx.land/terms, and would not hold Functionland liable for data loss.

connectToWallet.title: Connect To Wallet
connectToWallet.description: App needs notification permission to connect your wallet and perform data sync. Tap allow in the next prompt.

linkPassword.title: Set Identity
linkPassword.warning: Make sure to safeguard this password and the chain you used, it's the key to decrypt your data from new devices
linkPassword.passwordRisk: I understand the risk of losing my password
linkPassword.metamaskOpen: I already opened Metamask app before clicking Sign
linkPassword.walletConnectionInProgress: Wallet connection in progress, click to move back to the app
linkPassword.unableToSignWallet: Unable to sign the wallet address!

connectToBlox.title: Connect to Blox
connectToBlox.bleFailed: Unable to connect via Bluetooth, trying WiFi...
connectToBlox.hotspotInstructions: - Please turn your Blox on and connect your phone to the Blox's hotspot manually, and turn off mobile data.
connectToBlox.formatInstructions: - Make sure you have internal or external storage attached and format is either 'ext4' or 'vFat'.
connectToBlox.waitForBlueLight: After first boot please wait for 10 minutes until Blox flashes 'light-blue'
connectToBlox.connectedMessage: Now you are connected to Blox. Please wait...

connectToWifi.title: Connect to Wi-Fi
connectToWifi.noNetworksFound: We could not find the available WiFi, please use the button to manually enter the WiFi information.

setBloxAuthorizer.title: Set Blox Owner
setBloxAuthorizer.description: Adding the Blox App Peer ID as an owner on the Blox
setBloxAuthorizer.networkError: In some cases you need to turn the mobile data off, please make sure the phone is connected to the Blox's Hotspot and mobile data/VPN is off, Then press back and try again please
setBloxAuthorizer.updateNeeded: An update is awaiting a manual restart to be applied. You should unplug and plug back your blox to restart it and then try again.
setBloxAuthorizer.backendUpdate: You should update your blox backend, Please press 'Skip' button and connect it to your Wifi network.
setBloxAuthorizer.storageNeeded: To proceed successfully you need to attach an external storage to the Blox!
setBloxAuthorizer.skipDescription: The Skip is only intended when you are instructed to do so by the support team. Please enter the code given to you:
setBloxAuthorizer.invalidCodeMessage: The code you entered is incorrect. Please contact support if you need assistance.
setBloxAuthorizer.unableToGetProperties: Unable to get the blox properties!

setupComplete.connectPhone: Connect your phone to internet (wifi) to proceed now...
setupComplete.greenLed: Is you blox LED 'green' but you see this message?
setupComplete.internetReminder: Make sure your phone is connected to the internet and then try again
setupComplete.lightBlueLed: Is you blox flashing 'light-blue'? You probably entered wrong wifi password
setupComplete.notReachable: Your Blox is not reachable, seems it is not connected to the internet! Please turn your blox off and then turn it on and make sure it is on Hotspot mode, then try to reconnect the blox to the Wi-Fi
setupComplete.updating: Your blox is updating. Please wait for an hour for the update to complete.
setupComplete.disconnectHotspot: Meanwhile, feel free to disconnect your phone from FxBlox hotspot.
setupComplete.cyanFlashing: If Blox is flashing 'Cyan', it probably means you have entered the wrong password for your wifi. Connect to 'FxBlox' Wifi again and retry.
setupComplete.notConnectedToHotspot: It seems you are no longer connected to Hotspot, check if FxBlox hotspot is still available, if not, blox is already connected to internet and you can go to Home
setupComplete.unableToInitialize: Unable to initialize the fula network! error: {{error}} for fulaIsReady={{fulaIsReady}}

connectToExistingBlox.title: Bloxs in your network
connectToExistingBlox.selectBloxs: Select bloxs you want to add

checkConnection.couldntConnectTryAgain: Couldn't connect with {{ssid}}. Please try again.
checkConnection.allDone:
All done
Your device is connected with success!

connectedDevicesCard.title: Connected Devices
connectedDevicesCard.formatWarning: Your blox turns purple for 2 minutes and then reboots automatically. Please do not disturb the format process
connectedDevicesCard.formatConfirmation: Are you sure want to format all connected external blox partitions?
connectedDevicesCard.partitionRequestMessage: The partition request is sent and blox LED turns purple. Please wait 5 minutes as your blox restarts after partitioning

pools.connectWalletMessage: Please connect your wallet and wait for contract initialization
pools.leavePoolInProgress: Pool leave transaction in progress, click to return to the app
pools.confirmTransactionInWallet: Please confirm the transaction in your wallet
pools.leftPoolSuccessMessage: You have successfully left the pool
pools.leavePoolErrorMessage: Unable to leave the pool. Please try again.
pools.transactionRejectedMessage: You rejected the transaction in your wallet
pools.insufficientFundsMessage: You don't have enough funds to complete this transaction
pools.networkErrorMessage: Network connection issue. Please check your connection and try again.
